name: Adaptability & Resilience
description: Thrive in changing environments and bounce back from setbacks.

levels.title: Embracing Change
levels.objective: Develop a positive mindset towards change.
levels.description: Learn to view change as an opportunity rather than a threat.
practices: Accept a small change in your routine willingly
List 3 potential benefits of a recent unexpected event

levels.title: Learning Agility
levels.objective: Quickly learn new skills and unlearn old habits.
levels.description: Focus on being a lifelong learner and comfortable with being a beginner again.
practices: Learn the basics of a completely new subject in 1 week
Ask for feedback on what you need to improve
Reflect on a past failure and what it taught you

levels.title: Resilience Under Pressure
levels.objective: Maintain performance and well-being during stressful times.
levels.description: Build mental toughness and coping strategies for high-pressure situations.
practices: Support a colleague going through a tough time

resources.title: Mindset: The New Psychology of Success
